section.title: Event and Log Notification upon Automatic Migration of Highly Available Virtual Servers
section.para: When a virtual server is automatically migrated because of the high availability function, the details of an automatic migration are documented in the Events tab and in the engine log to aid in troubleshooting, as illustrated in the following examples:

example.title: Notification in the Events Tab of the Web Admin Portal
example.para: Highly Available Virtual_Machine_Name failed. It will be restarted automatically.
Virtual_Machine_Name was restarted on Host Host_Name

example.title: Notification in the Manager engine.log
example.para: This log can be found on the Red Hat Virtualization Manager at /var/log/ovirt-engine/engine.log:
Failed to start Highly Available VM. Attempting to restart. VM Name: Virtual_Machine_Name, VM Id:Virtual_Machine_ID_Number
